design_system.name: PocketQuest - Financial Literacy for Kids
design_system.description: A tactile, high-contrast, gamified interface that blends Saturday Morning Cartoon aesthetics with clear financial data. Uses 'Squircle' geometry, thick borders, and vibrant colors to create a safe, engaging learning environment.

primary.description: Sunshine Yellow - Used for primary actions, highlights, and success states.

secondary.description: Deep Ocean Blue - Used for headers, text, and structural elements.

accent.description: Burnt Orange - Used for urgent actions, alerts, and 'spending' contexts.

background.description: Pale Cyan - Global background color. Keeps the app feeling fresh and airy.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-fidelity, gamified educational platform. Do not use standard 'SaaS' layouts. Every element should feel like a toy or a game piece.
layout_rules: Ensure all containers have the 'thick border' and 'hard shadow' style defined in visual_enhancers.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use #1D3557 for text and borders.
Use generous padding (p-6 or p-8) inside cards.

component_overrides.Shadcn: Heavily customize Shadcn components. Remove default subtle borders and replace them with the 3px border-[#1D3557]. Increase border-radius to rounded-2xl or rounded-3xl.

instructions_to_main_agent.accessibility: Ensure all text on the #FFD23F (Yellow) background is #1D3557 (Dark Blue) for contrast. Text on #3D5A80 (Blue) must be White.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, prefer solid 'card' aesthetics for this specific kids app.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
